pullrequest.title: fix multiple non-default group collision bodies in urdf parser

content.raw: Can we also change some of the gzwarn's that happen when loading urdf's to gzmsg's? I'm thinking of [gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc:377](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f38ef6b4017da20abcd802ad4c0e1b9326b5ea02/gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc?at=default#cl-377) and [gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc:286](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f38ef6b4017da20abcd802ad4c0e1b9326b5ea02/gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc?at=default#cl-286). I can file this as a separate issue if it's contentious.
content.html: Can we also change some of the gzwarn's that happen when loading urdf's to gzmsg's? I'm thinking of gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc:377 and gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc:286. I can file this as a separate issue if it's contentious.
